— Tim O’Reilly

### `The Journey`

Welcome to ISSS608, a journey through the essentials of visual analytics where data not only informs but also transforms decision-making processes across industries.

Here, you'll explore innovative tools and techniques that make data visual, interactive, and actionable.

In this course, we delve into case studies, hands-on exercises, and collaborative projects that will enhance your ability to analyse complex data sets and communicate findings effectively.
